value.title: Soft delete for blobs capability for Azure Data Lake Storage is now in limited public preview
value.excerpt: If you have processes or tools to detect accidental deletion of files and directories for your Azure Data Lake Storage accounts, you can now also restore the deleted objects using soft delete for blobs capability. During the retention period that you specify, you can now restore a soft-deleted object

value.title: Azure Blob storage—NFS 3.0 protocol support generally available
value.excerpt: Azure Blob Storage is the only storage platform that supports NFS 3.0 protocol over object storage natively (no gateway or data copying required), with object storage economics. With multi-protocol support, customers can run their applications on a single storage platform with no application rewrites

value.title: Expanding DataParser with Microsoft's Azure Blob Storage integration
value.excerpt: The DataParser is widely used by regulated institutions to capture many types of on-line meeting and collaborative content such as Microsoft Teams, Cisco,

value.title: Microsoft Azure Blob leak a lesson to CISOs about cloud security responsibility
value.excerpt: Microsoft's apparent misconfiguration of its own cloud bucket exposed third-party intellectual property. Here are the takeaways for CISOs.

value.title: Azure Storage — Attribute-based Access Control (ABAC) now available for preview
value.excerpt: Attribute-based Access Control (ABAC) is an authorization mechanism that defines access levels based on attributes associated with security principals, resources, requests or the environment. You can now use ABAC in Azure Storage for Blobs and ADLS Gen2 by defining conditions on role-assignments based

value.title: Prevent Shared Key authorization for an Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Enhance secure access to Azure Storage accounts with Prevent Shared Key authorization.

value.title: Digital event: 5 reasons to attend Azure Storage Day
value.excerpt: Join us to discover cloud storage solutions for all of your workloads and learn how to help ensure scalability, security, and compliance with the right Azure storage solution for any use case.

value.title: General availability: Azure Blob storage supports objects up to 200 TB in size
value.excerpt: When moving from on premises, you no longer need to split your large files into separate parts to store and process in the cloud. Supporting a single object size up to 200TB removes one complexity when using Azure Storage.

value.title: Discover cloud storage solutions at Azure Storage Day on April 29
value.excerpt: Today, I am announcing Azure Storage Day, a free digital event on April 29 where you can explore cloud storage solutions for all your enterprise workloads. Join me to:

value.title: Pure Storage extends public cloud block storage to Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: Storage technology pioneer Pure Storage this morning said its software for managing public cloud block storage is available on Microsoft's Azure cloud computing service, adding to Pure's existing offering for Amazon AWS. Pure has defined itself as a ...

value.title: More performance and choice with new Azure HBv3 virtual machines for HPC
value.excerpt: Today Azure advances the velocity at which we bring the latest technologies to our HPC customers and the compute performance we put at their fingertips.

value.title: Built-in backup management at scale with Backup center
value.excerpt: During this period of the pandemic-disrupted workplace, we have seen unprecedented growth in cloud adoption and dependence on the cloud for data protection to address business continuity and ensure resilience.

value.title: Scale your critical applications cost-effectively with Azure Disk Storage
value.excerpt: To address today’s challenges like ensuring business continuity and managing reduced cash flow, organizations are accelerating their migration to the cloud. With a wide range of workloads migrating to the cloud, it is important to meet the unique scale needs of these workloads while keeping costs under

value.title: Zone Redundant Storage (ZRS) option for Azure managed disks in limited preview
value.excerpt: Zone Redundant Storage (ZRS) option for Azure managed disks protect disks from zonal failures which may occur due to natural disasters or hardware issues.

value.title: Back up Linux virtual machines running mission-critical workloads
value.excerpt: As organizations continue to embrace Linux, we see a growing number of enterprises running business and mission-critical workloads on Linux virtual machines in Azure. Azure Backup service offers application consistent backup of Linux virtual machines in Azure to safeguard against unintended destruction

value.title: Generally available: Copy Blob support over private endpoints in Azure Storage
value.excerpt: Azure Storage now supports copying of data between storage accounts using private endpoints. This includes support for the Copy Blob API and utilities such as AzCopy.

value.title: Azure Storage blob inventory public preview
value.excerpt: The Azure Storage blob inventory, which provides an overview of your blob data within a storage account, is now available for public preview in France Central, Canada Central, and Canada East.

value.title: HDInsight HBase Accelerated Writes with Premium Data Lake Storage Gen2 is now generally available
value.excerpt: With Premium Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 support for accelerated writes HDInsight HBase cluster, customers can now have increased read performance compared to standard storage and also take advantage of Hierarchical namespace feature of Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.

value.title: Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 recursive access control list (ACL) update is generally available
value.excerpt: Set, update, or remove access control lists (ACLs) recursively for existing Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 filesystem.

value.title: Policy to control the minimum TLS version used with Azure Storage now generally available
value.excerpt: Secure Azure Storage HTTPS connection with minimum TLS version via policy control.

value.title: Azure Cost Management and Billing updates – October 2020
value.excerpt: Last month, we shared a lot of cost optimization tips and tricks. Continuing with that focus, October is all about helping you save money on Azure infrastructure as a service (IaaS), database, or storage offerings. You'll also read about creating subscriptions via Azure Resource Manager deployment templates,

value.title: Migrate your Hadoop data lakes with WANDisco LiveData Platform for Azure
value.excerpt: It’s no secret that organizations consider data as one of their most valuable assets and are investing to build their capability for data-driven decision making. While it is challenging to institute a flexible and cost-effective data estate on-premises, the cloud offers an extensive set of innovative

value.title: Azure Blob – Soft Delete for Containers preview region expansion
value.excerpt: Azure Blob Soft Delete for Containers public preview is now available in all public Azure regions.

value.title: Sycomp launches an unmatched cloud data experience with Sycomp Storage Fueled by IBM Spectrum Scale on Azure
value.excerpt: Sycomp today introduces the first IBM Spectrum Scale solution on Azure. Sycomp Storage Fueled by IBM Spectrum Scale, a new cloud storage solution now available on the Microsoft Azure Marketplace. Sycomp Storage Fueled by IBM Spectrum Scale enables organizations to utilize different storage tiers,

value.title: Export and import securely to Azure Disk Storage with Azure Private Links integration (GA)
value.excerpt: Azure Disk Storage now enables enhanced security options for export and import via integration with Azure Private Links

value.title: Configurable backup storage redundancy options for Azure SQL Database coming soon
value.excerpt: New Azure SQL Database backup storage options coming soon, including local and zone-redundant storage.

value.title: Azure Blob storage lifecycle management now supports append blobs
value.excerpt: In addition to supporting block blobs, Azure Blob storage lifecycle management now offers a rich, rule-based policy to manage the retention of your append blobs.

value.title: Azure NetApp Files cross region replication and new enhancements in preview
value.excerpt: As businesses continue to adapt to the realities of the current environment, operational resilience has never been more important. As a result, a growing number of customers have accelerated a move to the cloud, using Microsoft Azure NetApp Files to power critical pieces of their IT infrastructure, like

value.title: Azure Blob storage object replication is now generally available
value.excerpt: Object replication allows you to replicate your block blob data at the blob level from one storage account to another anywhere in the Azure.

value.title: Azure Files SMB Multichannel provides improved performance for clients
value.excerpt: Today, we are announcing the preview of Azure Files SMB Multichannel on premium tier. With this release, Azure Files clients can now take advantage of this technology with premium file shares in the cloud.
